requirements.summary: Update the engagement rate display value in the media kit stats section to show exactly 5.2%
acceptanceCriteria: The engagement rate stat in the Media Kit section displays exactly '5.2%'.
All other stats and content remain unchanged.

file_operations.description: Update the engagement rate value in the mediaKit stats array to 5.2%. Locate the stat object with label 'Engagement Rate' and change its value to '5.2%'. Do not modify any other stat values, labels, or content.
